sentences.en: And it's a bit muggy, too.
Daytime sea breezes also help take the edge off but nights can be quite muggy.
sentences.cn: 虽然白天的徐徐海风也会起到降温的作用,但夜晚可能却是闷热难耐.

sentences.en: It was a muggy day and his shirt clung to his sweat.
sentences.cn: 天气闷热,他的衬衫和汗水紧紧黏在一起.
天气闷热潮湿，而且天色阴沉。

sentences.en: Muggy weather and hot carriage make me crazy!
sentences.cn: 闷热的天气,闷热的车厢,简直让我抓狂.

sentences.en: On muggy summer night, Gardenia brought about memories in the South.
sentences.cn: 闷热的夏夜, 栀子花带来关于南方的回忆.

sentences.en: Sometimes It be quite close and muggy.
The air was warm and muggy, and the top seemed to recede as he approached.
sentences.cn: 空气又热又闷,他越走, 山顶似乎反倒离得越远了.

sentences.en: The weather at this time of the year is muggy and oppressive.
sentences.cn: 每年的这个时候,天气会又闷又热.

sentences.en: Washington is still incredibly hot and muggy, though the leaves have started turning.
sentences.cn: 华盛顿依旧非常闷热,潮湿, 尽管树叶已经开始变黄.

sentences.en: We may expect muggy weather when the rainy season begins.
sentences.cn: 雨季开始时,我们预料有闷热的天气.

trans.tran_en: muggy weather is unpleasantly warm and the air seems wet
